name: Seedling
description:
It's a cute clicker game about a plant in a destroyed world. The plant launches its seedlings hoping to restore natural balance. You help the plant by buying upgrades and generating energy by clicking. Also speeding up seedlings and getting more energy from them.

There is a Lands menu where you can see the progress of restoring the world. Don't forget to click on the full bar of the land to raise its level.

Made with Pixi.js

Warning: there is no saving due to game jam time limitations and me being super tired from making this game for 3 days :D
